rules: Rule1: Whenever the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion, it requires setup of tables.
Rule2: Under the condition that the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion, it requires setup of electricity.
Rule3: Either the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion or the cooking demo is held at the park pavilion.
Rule4: Provided that the cooking demo is held at the park pavilion, the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage.
Rule5: If the pasta contest requires setup of a sound system, then the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage.
Rule6: Whenever the pasta contest requires setup of tables, it requires setup of a sound system.
Rule7: If it is not the case that the pasta contest being approved implies the festival is successful, then the cooking demo has a conflict with the main stage.
Rule8: If it is not the case that the pasta contest requiring electricity setup implies the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage, then electricity has a backup generator.
Rule9: If it is not the case that electricity having a backup generator implies it has an issue with the generator, then the pasta contest is canceled.
facts: Fact1: The pasta contest is approved.
Fact2: The pasta contest is not canceled.
Fact3: Electricity does not have an issue with the generator.
